Original: Thank goodness you have come! Are you
going to accept that request? Oh, but
you must!
[Page]
A well-known gourmand is making absurd
orders at the inn and giving Dalla
the hardest of times.
[Page]
I have heard rumors about him, but I
never thought he would show his face
in Tharsis...
[Page]
He has allegedly driven hundreds of
inns and restaurants out of business!
Go! Quickly! To the inn!
Translation: Thank goodness you have come! Are you
going to accept that request? Oh, but
you must!
[Page]
A well-known gourmand is making absurd
orders at the inn and giving Dalla
the hardest of times.
[Page]
I have heard rumors about him, but I
never thought he would show his face
in Tharsis...
[Page]
He has allegedly driven hundreds of
inns and restaurants out of business!
Go! Quickly! To the inn!

Original: Ah, you have returned. Welcome back.
[Page]
The gourmand just fled from the inn
with tears, snot, and assorted other
fluids staining his face...
[Page]
Was this your work? No? It wasn't...?
[Page]
Hmm...
[Page]
Well... Er... The request is complete,
at least. I have no complaints.
I again thank you for your hard work.
Translation: Ah, you have returned. Welcome back.
[Page]
The gourmand just fled from the inn
with tears, snot, and assorted other
fluids staining his face...
[Page]
Was this your work? No? It wasn't...?
[Page]
Hmm...
[Page]
Well... Er... The request is complete,
at least. I have no complaints.
I again thank you for your hard work.

Original: Oh my, the [Guild] Guild. Welcome.
[Page]
My request? Oh! Yes. We have a guest
right now who is just... unpleasable,
and I'm having trouble handling him.
[Page]
He asks for things I can't understand,
like, [Color:5]"Bring me a dish that makes
one strong!"[Color:0]
[Page]
Do you explorers know what he means?
I need you to gather ingredients that
fit his order into this wooden box.
Translation: Oh my, the [Guild] Guild. Welcome.
[Page]
My request? Oh! Yes. We have a guest
right now who is just... unpleasable,
and I'm having trouble handling him.
[Page]
He asks for things I can't understand,
like, [Color:5]"Bring me a dish that makes
one strong!"[Color:0]
[Page]
Do you explorers know what he means?
I need you to gather ingredients that
fit his order into this wooden box.

Original: When you have the ingredients, please
bring them back to me.
Translation: When you have the ingredients, please
bring them back to me.

Original: You obtained [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0]!
[Page]
If you believe it fits the gourmand's
demand for a [Color:5]"dish that makes one
strong,"[Color:0] you may put it into the box.
Translation: You obtained [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0]!
[Page]
If you believe it fits the gourmand's
demand for a [Color:5]"dish that makes one
strong,"[Color:0] you may put it into the box.

Original: [Color:5]Put [Color:6][Number:1][Color:5] in the box?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Put [Color:6][Number:1][Color:5] in the box?[Color:0]

Original: You put the [Number:1] into
the wooden box. All that remains
is to take this to the inn...
Translation: You put the [Number:1] into
the wooden box. All that remains
is to take this to the inn...

Original: You decide to put the [Number:1]
with the rest of your possessions
rather than into the wooden box.
Translation: You decide to put the [Number:1]
with the rest of your possessions
rather than into the wooden box.

Original: Oh, welcome back, dearies. Did you
find something for, ahem, a [Color:5]"dish
that makes one strong"[Color:0]?
[Page]
Oh, this [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0]... You're
all sure about this? All right, then,
I trust you, dears.
[Page]
Well, I'd best go prepare something
quickly for that man. Please wait...
Translation: Oh, welcome back, dearies. Did you
find something for, ahem, a [Color:5]"dish
that makes one strong"[Color:0]?
[Page]
Oh, this [Color:6][Number:1][Color:0]... You're
all sure about this? All right, then,
I trust you, dears.
[Page]
Well, I'd best go prepare something
quickly for that man. Please wait...

Original: You were right, dearies! Spot on!
Our guest was very satisfied. I knew
I was right to believe in you!
[Page]
But then... right after his meal was
done, he put in another ridiculous
order...
[Page]
This time, he asked for something
silly, like [Color:5]"a dish that can make
me smart"[Color:0]...
[Page]
I'm very sorry, but can I trouble you
once more? I'll make sure to add
something extra to the reward...
Translation: You were right, dearies! Spot on!
Our guest was very satisfied. I knew
I was right to believe in you!
[Page]
But then... right after his meal was
done, he put in another ridiculous
order...
[Page]
This time, he asked for something
silly, like [Color:5]"a dish that can make
me smart"[Color:0]...
[Page]
I'm very sorry, but can I trouble you
once more? I'll make sure to add
something extra to the reward...

Original: Oh, dearies, I'm afraid you had it
wrong. The guest was so mad, he broke
my table...
[Page]
Whatever that [Number:1] was,
it wasn't what he wanted... I'm sorry,
but can you all try one more time?
Translation: Oh, dearies, I'm afraid you had it
wrong. The guest was so mad, he broke
my table...
[Page]
Whatever that [Number:1] was,
it wasn't what he wanted... I'm sorry,
but can you all try one more time?

one strong."

one strong."
